> Reducing food’s environmental impacts through producers and consumers

https://science.sciencemag.org/content/360/6392/987/

```{r}
source("field_highwire_adjunct_files.R")
land_use %>% 
  top_n(25, Median) %>%
  gg_do_mean() +
  labs(
    title = "25 most land-consuming products (By mean)", 
    subtitle = "From: 'Reducing food’s environmental impacts through producers and consumers'\nhttps://science.sciencemag.org/content/360/6392/987/",
    x = "Product", 
    y = "Mean land use", 
    caption = "Via @VegViz"
  )
```

```{r}
land_use %>% 
  top_n(25) %>%
  gg_do_median() +
  labs(
    title = "25 most land-consuming products (By median)", 
    subtitle = "From: 'Reducing food’s environmental impacts through producers and consumers'\nhttps://science.sciencemag.org/content/360/6392/987/",
    x = "Product", 
    y = "Median land use", 
    caption = "Via @VegViz"
  )
```
